item.title: IRC and Pig
item.description: The Tech Shelf Where Westley talks about IRC /join #untilitsnotfun /nick dadofapollo (12:04:08) Westley is now known as dadofapollo (12:05:16 PM) dadofapollo: IRC (Internet Relay Chat) is a beautiful relic of the internet that helped set the stage for how we communicate on the internet today. IRC was one of the first internet based chat systems. Users can enter different chat rooms called channels and can start communicating with anyone else that is in the same channel.

item.title: Special Edition: Test Run
item.description: Popcorn and A Coke Where Jacob talks movies The first movie review was intimidating. Preface This adventure Westley and I have set out on is purely for enjoyment. So then, why is reviewing a movie intimidating? Not because of the difficulty, but rather, because of the respect I have for this field of “Film Making.” Resistance will forever be my antagonist, so here’s to another battle. I will probably stick to two types of “reviews.
